articles.description: Once a highly-rated English talent, who won three caps for his country, Rodwell hasn't stepped out on a football pitch in over 16 months - but has been given a chance to resurrect his career.
articles.content:
Forgotten man Jack Rodwell is back in football after being signed by Australian outfit Western Sydney Wanderers.
